text: Muthukkudayum Choodi is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Baiju Thomas. ==Cast== * Mukesh as Rajendran * Sithara as Gayathri * Jagathi Sreekumar as Meppiladu Sukumaran * Baiju as Ajayan * Jagadish as Jayan * Kaviyoor Ponnamma as Madhavi * Bobby Kottarakkara as Neelakandon * Poojappura Ravi as Parameshwara Kurup * Santhakumari as Gayathri's mother * Karamana Janardhanan Nair as Inchivillakam Damodhara Kurup * Radhadevi as Sarasu * * Panjabi as Gayathri's father == Soundtrack == Songs were composed by Darsan Raman, with lyrics by S. Ramesan Nair. {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%;" ! # !! Title !! Singer(s) |- | 1 | "Thaalathil Chaanchadum" | K. J. Yesudas, K. S. Chitra |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: Muthukkudayum Choodi
